duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales
Opening and closing the store in the absence of other management, ensuring safe and legal trading
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service, ensuring a fun and enjoyable shopping experience
Demonstrating Claire's products and assisting customers with queries using product knowledge
Assisting with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, promotions, and ear piercing (full training provided)
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to customers
